game.name: JUNGLE RUNNER
game.shortDescription: JUNGLE RUNNER this is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world and various bonuses, but in cinematic graphics. For those who don't know: a runner is a game in which the goal is to run as far as possible from the start, and dodge various obstacles along the way.
game.shortDescriptionEn: JUNGLE RUNNER this is a classic runner game with a procedurally generated world and various bonuses, but in cinematic graphics. For those who don't know: a runner is a game in which the goal is to run as far as possible from the start, and dodge various obstacles along the way.
